name: Die Last
description:
Welcome to this mysterious room full of gears and traps. You and other three players will choose a position first. Then the gears and traps will begin to work, let's see who will survive in 30 seconds!

You need to pay 10 coins as entrance fee, and the survivors will earn the coins from the dead.

Now the room is set, are you ready?

Features:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Meet these thrilling puzzles, you may need some luck to survive
* Endless modes, you'll find it very addicted
* One finger touch, easy to operate
